instruction: Suggest some additional steps to make a perfect omelette.
input: Fry eggs in a pan with butter.
output: Gently fold the omelette onto the side of the pan, allowing the uncooked egg to spill over into the pan. Cook until the omelette is set, then carefully flip the omelette over and cook the other side until it’s set. Finally, slide the omelette onto a plate and season to taste.
